i'm_interested_in_requesting_an_airport_: I'm interested in requesting an airport shuttle
we’ll_tell_your_accommodation_that_you’r: We’ll tell your accommodation that you’re interested so they can provide details and costs.
i'm_interested_in_renting_a_car: I'm interested in renting a car
make_the_most_out_of_your_trip_and_check: Make the most out of your trip and check car hire options in your booking confirmation.
want_to_book_a_taxi_or_shuttle_ride_in_a: Want to book a taxi or shuttle ride in advance?
avoid_surprises_get_from_the_airport_to_: Avoid surprises - get from the airport to your accommodation without a hitch. We'll add taxi options to your booking confirmation.
please_send_me_name_emails_with_travel_d: Please send me {{name}} emails with travel deals, special offers and other information.
your_rooms_will_be_ready_for_check-in_at: Your rooms will be ready for check-in at {{time}}
24-hour_front_desk_help_whenever_you_nee: 24-hour front desk - Help whenever you need it!
special_requests_cannot_be_guaranteed: Special requests cannot be guaranteed – but the property will do its best to meet your needs. You can always make a special request after your booking is complete!
i'd_like_rooms_close_to_each_other: I'd like rooms close to each other (if available)
title_booking_detail: Your booking information has been released!
discription_booking_detail: Upload your voucher here or in the waiting message or spam section at {{email}} We hope you have a nice day!
discription_encryption: Encryption: All transactions on Tripbooking are 100% guaranteed and safe.
